DOC.brief_summary: From previous study appear menaquinone-7 ( MK-7 ) effective form vitamin K. The Japanese soya product natto one rich food source MK-7 . However , taste natto appreciate western society . For reason active biological compound produce capsule . Different technique encapsulation vitamin lead different absorption profile intake . Therefore important study influence type encapsulation technique absorption menaquinone-7 . This study undertaken compare absorption menaquinones two different encapsulation technique . Absorption profile menaquinone-4 menaquinone-7 conventional softgel capsule newly develop GellpelTM capsule compare .
